DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Weekly location data deer fidelity analysis
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: File contains individual deer ID as well as date, latitude, longitude and allocated season of GPS locations used to determine site fidelity of black-tailed deer in the Mendocino National Forest, California, USA.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: cervids
familiarity
habitat
movement
philopatry
survival
